basics.name: Alain Villagrasa Labrador
basics.summary: Computer Science graduate & research intern at UNIZAR

courses: Class representative during the 3rd and 4th course of the degree
Mentor for incoming students during those same years
Volunteered at different events such as DFRWS, DFeX and JNIC among other minor events

work.name: DisCo, Universidad de Zaragoza
work.summary: Development MALVADA, a flexible and modular framework for malware execution traces datasets and the Windows Malware Execution Traces (WinMET) dataset. This work was published in May 2025 on SoftwareX, doi: 10.1016/j.softx.2025.102082
